spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The draegloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 11}). The draegloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put it to sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) slashing damage.
